#include<iostream>
#include<map>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	
	vector < long long int > v,v5;
	map < long long int ,long long int > m1;
	map < long long int ,vector < long long int > > m;
	long long int t,n,m4,k,p=1,ps,pq=1,q,t1;
	cin>>t;
	
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		cin>>m4;
		k=n*m4;
		m[k].push_back(p);
		v.push_back(k);
		p=p+1;
	}
	sort(v.begin(),v.end());
	
	/*for(int i=v.size()-1;i>=0;i--)
	{
		cout<<v[i]<<" ";
		
	}
	map < long long int ,vector < long long int > > ::iterator it;
	for(it=m.begin();it!=m.end();it++)
	{
		cout<<it->first<<" ";
		for(int i=0;i!=it->second.size();i++)
		{
			cout<<it->second[i]<<" ";
		}
		cout<<"\n";
	}*/
	long long int y=0;
	for(int i=v.size()-1;i>=0;i-- )
	{
		ps=m[v[i]][y];
		m1[pq]=ps;
		pq=pq+1;
		if(v[i]!=v[i-1])
		{
			y=0;
		}
		else if(v[i]==v[i-1])
		{
			y=y+1;
		}
		
	}
	/*map < long long int ,long long int > ::iterator it2;
	for(it2=m1.begin();it2!=m1.end();it2++)
	{
		cout <<it2->first<<" "<<it2->second<<"\n";
	}*/
	cin>>q;
	while(q--)
	{
		cin>>t1;
		v5.push_back(t1);
	}
	for(int i=0;i!=v5.size();i++)
	{
		cout<<m1[v5[i]]<<"\n";
	}
	
}
